boardgame.name: Thunderstone: Drachenturm
Thunderstone: Dragonspire
Thunderstone: Le pic du dragon
Thunderstone: le pic du dragon
サンダーストーン：竜の尖塔
boardgame.description: Thunderstone: Dragonspire is a fantasy deck-building game much in the style of Dominion. Before the game starts a selection of Village and Hero cards will be randomly chosen that players may add to their specific decks. Like Dominion, every player starts with a basic deck of weaker cards that they can use to purchase other more powerful cards. In Thunderstone these cards may be different Heroes such as mages, archers, thieves, or warriors; or they may be supplies the heroes need like weapons, rations, or light to reach further into the dungeon._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A dungeon deck is also created by combining several different groups of monsters together. Certain groups of monsters may be more or less susceptible to different Hero types so players must take this into account when they choose what to buy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Rather than buying puny Victory Points, players will use their deck to defeat monsters in the dungeon. From the monster deck a row of cards is laid out. On their turn, players may choose to visit either the dungeon or the village. Plays can purchase other cards for their deck or level up their heroes in the village. If they instead go to the dungeon, they play their heroes, weapons, items, and spells to defeat any one of the available monsters. The deeper the monster is in the dungeon, the more light is needed or the monster will gain power. Some monsters also have special abilities which may hinder the player. If they have enough strength they defeat the monster and place that card in their deck. This card is worth victory points and often can be used as money to purchase other cards. In addition to this players are awarded experience points for defeating monsters which can be used to upgrade their heroes into more powerful versions. The game is played until the Thunderstone is revealed from the dungeon and a player is able to claim it. The player with the most victory points in their deck is the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Thunderstone returns with Dragonspire! Featuring all-new art for every card (even Militia and Daggers), experience point tokens (not cards!), and the all new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Setting_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; cards which alter the game on a global scale. Dragonspire includes 18 new village cards, 11 new heroes, and 8 new monster sets._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;With enough cards to play the game right out of the box, this is a great Thunderstone edition for those just getting into the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dragonspire also has a new storage box format, plastic XP tokens, and a brand new Dungeon board to help players keep up with light and darkness._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Thunderstone: Dragonspire is not a an expansion, but is instead a separate stand-alone game that may be played along with components of Thunderstone._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;NOTE: The Dragon-Humanoid divider included with the game is meant for a future expansion as a promo._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2011 Golden Geek Best Board Game Expansion Nominee
2011 Golden Geek Best Card Game Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG 5015) Thunderstone returns with Dragonspire! Featuring all-new art for every card (even Militia and Daggers), experience point tokens (not cards!), and the all new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Setting_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; cards which alter the game on a global scale. Dragonspire includes 18 new village cards, 11 new heroes, and 8 new monster sets. With enough cards to play the game right out of the box, this is a great Thunderstone expansion for those just getting into the game. Dragonspire also has a new storage box format, plastic XP tokens, and a brand new Dungeon board to help players keep up with light and darkness.

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG 5015) Thunderstone returns with Dragonspire! Featuring all-new art for every card (even Militia and Daggers), experience point tokens (not cards!), and the all new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Setting_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; cards which alter the game on a global scale. Dragonspire includes 18 new village cards, 11 new heroes, and 8 new monster sets. With enough cards to play the game right out of the box, this is a great Thunderstone expansion for those just getting into the game. Dragonspire also has a new storage box format, plastic XP tokens, and a brand new Dungeon board to help players keep up with light and darkness.

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG 5015) The Doomgate is open, and Doom has been released into the world! The forces of destruction stalk the lands, destroying all they touch. There is but one dim flicker of hope: the Thunderstones, scattered at the dawn of time. Two lie hidden deep within the Dragonspire. Will your heroes be the first to reach them? Dragonspire is a stand-alone expansion to Thunderstone. The cards within can be played with any or all of the past Thunderstone sets, or can be used by themselves as a fully playable set. Dragonspire adds a fresh crew of new heroes, along with new spells, villagers, and weapons all ready to help your stand against the darkness. They will be needed, for within new terrors have awakened: bloodthirsty undead, blistering elementals, wrathful dragons, and mighty giants! Dragonspire also includes brand-new dungeon settings, campaign rules, and an entirely new way to face Doom alone!

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG 5015) The Doomgate is open, and Doom has been released into the world! The forces of destruction stalk the lands, destroying all they touch. Dragonspire adds a fresh crew of new heroes, along with new spells, villagers, and weapons all ready to help your stand against the darkness. They will be needed, for within new terrors have awakened: bloodthirsty undead, blistering elementals, wrathful dragons, and mighty giants! Dragonspire also includes brand-new dungeon settings, campaign rules, and an entirely new way to face Doom alone!

They are currently all fit and organized in the Dragonspire box. I will include the other boxes upon request. Thanks for looking!
barely used. buyer pays paypal fees.

This lot includes Thunderstone: Dragonspire, Thunderstone, Thunderstone: Wrath of Elements, Thunderstone: Doomgate Legion, Thunderstone: Thornwood Siege, Thunderstone: Heart of Doom, and a number of promo cards. All the cards are organized in the Dragonspire box and no other boxes are available. While I think the cards are in excellent condition I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m hesitant to mark the condition as Like New.

Thunderstone Base Game is included in the box. The base game is missing the small divider cards. If you have Wrath of the Elements it included much better replacement dividers. Dragonspire is missing the randomizer cards for Wrath of the Elements and Doomgate Legion (again, not a huge deal). Otherwise it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in perfect shape and never played.

This is the ultimate upgrade to your Thunderstone Advance game: get all of these 1st edition cards that are still compatible with the Advance game. Includes just about everything you need from the original Thunderstone, Thornwood Siege, Wrath of the Elements, Doomgate Legion, and Dragonspire. I have priced this at about half of the price of buying each of these separately. All cards are in very good condition, most in like-new condition. A few cards and dividers are missing as noted below, and a few dividers have stickers over the label on one of their two (identical sides). You get every type of monster, every type of hero, randomizers, VP tokens, storage tray, rulebooks, the board that came with Dragonspire, two sets of basic cards (militia, torch, dagger, iron rations, disease/special disease), Thunderstone cards, guardians, treasures and traps, dungeon features, etc. I have verified the counts of all hero, village, and monster cards. You get the following 30 monsters, and all 10 cards of each unless otherwise noted: Abyssal Abyssal - Malformed Abyssal - Thunderspawn Bandit - Humanoid Centaur Cultist - Humanoid Dark Enchanted Doomknight - Humanoid Dragon Elemental - Fire Elemental - Nature Elemental - Pain Enchanted (missing 1 out of 10) Evil Druid - Humanoid Giant Golem Horde Humanoid Hydra - Dragon Ooze Orc - Humanoid Raider - Humanoid Siege Swarm Undead - I also have the Doomgate Legion (smaller) box (missing its divider) that I can include with the rest of the cards, or I can just put them in a baggie (let me know). Domestic US shipping is actual shipping cost for approx. 200oz (incl. box) to your zip code from 30082 plus $3 for box and packaging (I will finalize after you order, but expect it to be about $15-$20 total). International shipping will be actual price plus USD$5.00 (for the box and hassle, sorry, it is much more effort on my end). Contact me if you have any questions about shipping. I have many other games up for sale and in most cases I can combine shipping for some significant savings, but please check with me and provide your zip code for details.
